Do you like half-life? Do you want more? If yes, you should get this add on. It doesn't really do to much to expand on the story, but it does a a lot in the way of guns and gameplay. I also found it more challenging. Don't mistake that for this game being hard. It is not, but it feels like a natural progression from the gameplay of the base game.
shoutout to spin off game characters, gotta be one of my favorite genders

A great expantion pack to half life with new weapons and enemies. Does get a bit frustrating at times when you have very low hp and theres a bunch of OP enemies but nevertheless its worth it.
nice side game

Отличное дополнение к первой халве, дополнение ни чем не уступает оригинальной игре. По продолжительности игра примерно такая-же, однако тут больше упор сделан на шутерную составляющею чем на головоломки. Дополнение повествует о капрале шепарде, из морской пехоты сша подразделение "HECO". Добавлено большое количество нововведение, например новые виды оружия - снайперская винтовка/пулемёт и большое количество инопланетного оружия - спорометатель, шоковый таракан, ручной барнакл. Имеется несколько эксперементальных пушек. Добавлено большое количество врагов например целых 2 новых вида зомби, раса Х, мужские "черные оперативники". Теперь наши товарищи имеют большой вес, например могут открывать потаённые двери, прикрывают и существенно помогают в бою, медики позволяют лечиться. Короче бойцы хеко намного полезнее охранников с пукалками. Разумеется имеются баги и иногда солдатам приходиться по несколько раз давать команду "идти за мной" но всё равно они оказывают должную помощь. Короче огромное количество нововведений и всё это в совокупности с новой историей под другим углом. Могу с уверенностью сказать что этот шутан шедевр, из минусов устаревшая графика. Так же мне не нравиться эффект "прибора ночного видения".  Смело рекомендую тем кому графика в играх неважна.

"Half-Life: Opposing Force" is the first expansion pack Half-Life from 1999, in the last millennia. The player (US. Marine) is sent to the Black Mesa and fights various aliens and black ops units. Story events convey through the use of scripted sequences.

I came to play this game after finishing the remake of the Original Half-life (Black Mesa). I used to play this back in the days with friends. The original Half-life feel is still there. Guns behave nicely and puzzles are engaging. It is nice to see things Black Mesa from another perspective, again. 

I run into a couple of bugs, like the mouse not moving at first or being stuck after loading the next area couple of times. The game is shorter than I remember, only a few hours long. Textures and models now look dated, but overall this was nice trip to the memory lane.

This game deserves similar treatment that Crowbar Collective did to the original Half-Life. Good times!

meio nada a ver esse tanto de arma nova, tirando o revolver diferente, as armas biológicas e criaturas de xen novas foram inseridas no game só pra encher linguiça, de resto daora.

Algo que sempre me atraiu é quando o protagonista utiliza muitas armas e esse jogo tem mais armas do que o Half-Life original, além de armas que são bem diferenciadas e muito estranhas e isso é muito legal.
A jogabilidade é quase igual a do Half-Life original, mas tem algo que não gostei, a visão noturna que ao jogar achei que é pior que a clássica e boa lanterna.
O inimigos são bem diferentes, os alienígenas, porque os humanos são iguais, contudo não são ruins.

Nesse você é um dos soldados enviados para os laboratórios da Black Mesa com o objetivo de matar tudo o que ver, humano ou não. Não é um jogo difícil, mas me trouxe um grande inimigo: escalar uma corda. Simplesmente impossível, eu morri mais vezes tentando escalar uma corda com físicas horríveis do que no chefe final (que eu perdi umas boas horas tentando entender como derrotar, já que não havia feedback suficiente para saber se eu estava fazendo algo certo ou não), e olha que jogos de tiro em primeira pessoa não são o meu forte.
bastante bueno se pude ver de mejor forma las instalaciones de black mesa

This game was beyond my expectations, probably because I played Blue Shift first.
Interesting story with good gameplay, showing you the perspective of the "bad" guys, and that the conflict going on is more complicated than what you could see in the first game. Gameplay is about 5 hours but it offers so much.

The best for me was the new variety of enemies, each of them unique. A lot of new cool alien designs and alien weapons as well. Also added some cool new game mechanics like the grapple barnacle. It actually surprised me how different this game was from the original and actually added a lot of new features.

If you enjoyed Half-Life, you should absolutely play this as well. Definitely much better than Blue Shift, but both are worth playing.
Muy buena expansión para ver otro punto de vista de la aventura Half Life 1.
